sentences.en: Getting Hollywood's latest films released on laser-disc has also helped.
sentences.cn: 通过激光视盘发行好莱坞最新电影也起到了一定作用。

sentences.en: In the laser this damping mechanism can be visualized as follows.
sentences.cn: 在激光器中,这种阻尼机理可以如下理解.

sentences.en: Laser discs can store prodigious amounts of information.
sentences.cn: 激光磁盘能够贮存大量信息。

sentences.en: Laser light does not spread out even at great distances.
sentences.cn: 激光即使经过很远的距离也不会扩散.

sentences.en: Laser printers give high quality print.
sentences.cn: 激光打印机的打印质量很好。

sentences.en: Ophthalmic surgeons are now performing laser surgery to correct myopia.
sentences.cn: 眼科医生现在采用激光手术来矫正近视。

sentences.en: Producing laser photons is too expensive to make most compounds economically.
sentences.cn: 产生激光光子的费用太高,因此,不能用它很经济地制造出大多数化合物.

sentences.en: Researchers realised that a tunable laser beam might be useful in surgery.
sentences.cn: 研究人员意识到，可调谐激光束也许可以用在外科手术中。

sentences.en: The technical superiority of laser discs over tape is well established.
sentences.cn: 激光影碟相对于磁带的技术优势早已牢牢确立。

sentences.en: These applications require , at most, only a few watts of laser power.
sentences.cn: 这些应用所用的激光功率最多为几瓦.

sentences.en: These links are then fused as needed using laser or other techniques.
sentences.cn: 可熔连线是靠激光或别的方法按需要熔断的.

sentences.en: They've just lent me a laser disc player.
sentences.cn: 他们刚借了我一部激光视盘播放机。

sentences.en: This will also change according to the wavelength of the laser light.
sentences.cn: 但这也会随着激光波长的改变而改变.

phrases.tran_cn: 准分子雷射；受激准分子激光器
大功率激光器；高功率雷射
激光技术；雷射技术；激光工艺
环形激光器，环式激光器
激光器；掺钕钇铝石榴石激光器

trans.tran_en: a piece of equipment that produces a powerful narrow beam of light that can be used in medical operations, to cut metals, or to make patterns of light for entertainment
